name: BASS BALL
description:
Adjust the volume sliders to guide the balls to the portal.

Music created by Posies. Check out their music here: https://posies.bandcamp.com/

Game was made for the Genre Mash Jam: https://itch.io/jam/genre-mash-jam

The theme was "Reusable" and required the game to mix two or more genres together. BASS BALL is a physics-based rhythm platformer where you need to adjust the volume of the music on different sets of blocks to achieve a high score. 

Assets used: 

Audio Visualization: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/audio/audio-visualization-163282

Portal Effect: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/particles-effects/portal-effect-1670...
